Reviews.Title: Ok product
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: The battery life is average for a tablet, it is not removable, and drains faster than a cellphones does. The seller responded well to my questions, and was fast shipping. I put my full size sim card in it from At&T; go phone, and it works good for phone calls.  I do not have a data plan so have just used wifi.After owning this a couple months I would recommend this product.  Works great!  No problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome birthday present!!!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Hey guys, I purchased this phablet for my granddaughter for her 14th birthday. I had never heard of a "phablet" before finding this one. What do you get a teenager who has everything??? A tablet/phone that has everything! I ssearched, researched, over and over again and again. I settled on this because of all the features it comes with. I purchased it & had it forwarded to her. She's very tech savvy & put her T-Mobile sim card, her SD card & set up her wifi in a matter of minutes. She absolutely loves it!!! The seller is wonderful, she received it 2 days early. I left part of the address off by mistake, I emailed them & within minutes they got back to me & said they would resend it as soon as it was returned. Thank goodness I spoke with the post office & they re-delivered to the correct address. Also she had a problem with her charger, I contacted the seller, they sent out a new one to her without question. Great seller and product!

Reviews.Title: 5 Star Product
Reviews.Author: Raycard M. R. Lovera
Reviews.Content: I just got this Tablet phone today, works here in the curacao fine, phone is unlocked, can install WhatsApp on it, comes with Google play pre installed, its really fast, can watch videos with youtube app really fine. The volume of the speakers is very good. Didn't see any flops as yet. Will write if I get any.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Joseph Tette
Reviews.Content: The product worked great but unfortunately had to be returned because it was not completely compatible with my cell provider.  The calling and the text messaging worked but the data would not (unless using Wi-Fi, in which case it worked flawlessly).  If the data worked then I would have definitely kept the Phablet but the main reason I bought it was to have a bigger screen for Netflix.  The reason I gave it 5 stars is because Indigi's customer service made everything so easy and they even waived the restocking fee. Thank you Indigi.

Reviews.Title: it needs improvement
Reviews.Author: Lacara Hickman
Reviews.Content: Battery life sucks!!!  It takes a while to charge, that's not good for traveling. The charger is not snug in the slot!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Charles Sizer
Reviews.Content: Device has surpassed my expectations.  I was using a LG Optimus Pro, a very expensive device.  Have not used it since I got my Phablet.

Reviews.Title: had to return it
Reviews.Author: Melba
Reviews.Content: The tablet looks nice. Not happy that it was not able to pick up the sim card for at and t since it was supposed to be unlocked. Tried several times and I became frustrated with it since that was my primary reason for buying it. So don't buy it if you are thinking of using it with the at and t 3g sim card. I  contacted the seller and was told to return it because something might be wrong with it. I was told that I  would be reimbursed the shipping fees on exchange for the other one. At this point  I did return it but customer service was a bit slow with them. When I decided to actually return the item I was credited the amount for the item and restocking fee was waived. Which I didn't know there was one and not reimbursed the shipping fees. So in the end through this experience I would say be careful when it sounds too good to be true. Don't buy it because if it truly was unlocked it should have worked right away.

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone
Reviews.Author: Barbara W.
Reviews.Content: I love it !!!  I have no problemswith the phablet! I order it on the7th of march and got it march 13th wow!!l love it!!My phone was stolen and I was going to have to pay about 350-600 dollars for a new one! Thanks so MUCH!

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: Harriet Owusu-Mantey
Reviews.Content: Work very nice it's a little bit big to put in your pocket other than that is a very nice phone and tablet put together

Reviews.Title: Big phone!!!
Reviews.Author: Keith Bryant
Reviews.Content: I can't get enough amazed responses!  No one can believe that this is a phone!  It does everything the description says it does!!

Reviews.Title: poorly made
Reviews.Author: I clarke
Reviews.Content: The overall function of this product is ok,but the cheap parts used to make the product is not worth the headache. I purchased one gor my sister and in day three it was very scratched and looked very old. The material used to make the screen is cheap. After a few days the screen will be overly scratched. I have an ipad and don't have that problem at all.

Reviews.Title: I didnt receive the phone in 2 days like prime should be
Reviews.Author: Breohnna W.
Reviews.Content: I didnt receive the phone in 2 days like prime should be. it said it was delievered in my orders but wasnt, i got it like almost 2 weeks late! plus the phone wont turn on at all, all it does is vibrate when i try to turn it on. the screen is all black still but the phone will vibrate til the phone dies.. i think it dies, i cant tell.. this phone sucks!

Reviews.Title: false selling
Reviews.Author: ky
Reviews.Content: They said the phone took tmobile an att well they lied it dont take tmobile wrong move trying to save money never again get your facts right before you sell thanks returning this false -----

ProductInfo.Features:
7.0 inches Android 4.0 Tablet PC Smart Pad + Phone (Call as mobile phone) with Google Play Store and Capacitive Touch Screen
Allwinner A13 Cortex-A8 Processor 1.5GHz CPU, 4GB Internal Memory, WiFi Capability, Bluetooth, Dual-Camera and more.
Make and receive calls directly from the tablet itself with the built-in MIC and speaker
WiFi 802.11 b/g/n Support - Connect to internet for A full Internet experience | Bluetooth enabled - connect to any bluetooth headset handsfree
Support Google Play Store - access to millions of free and paid-for applications available to download straight to your phablet.
ProductInfo.Name: Phablet 7" Android 4.0 GSM Tablet Phone - Unlocked - AT&T
